issue.title: [CF 1577] Why does Disengage icon show "1"?
issue.body:
When comparing the other icons' configuration (ones not showing the "1") I can't see any difference.

(I suppose the number means how many charges is left...?)

 

My TMW group:

^1^T^SPoint^T ^Sy^N22 ^Spoint^STOPLEFT ^Sx^F7916484793729024 ^f-45^t ^SRows^N3 ^SLocked^B ^SGUID^STMW:group:1JknAv1eqTyK ^SColumns^N1 ^SIcons^T ^N1^T ^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Scooldown ^SName^SCounter~`Shot ^SShowTimerText^B ^SEnabled^B ^SStates^T ^N1^T ^SAlpha^N0.5 ^t^N2^T ^SAlpha^N1 ^t^N3^T ^t^N4^T ^t^t^t^N2^T ^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Scooldown ^SShowTimerText^B ^SName^SFreezing~`Trap ^SEnabled^B ^SStates^T ^N1^T ^SAlpha^N0.5 ^t^N2^T ^SAlpha^N1 ^t^N3^T ^t^N4^T ^t^t^t^N3^T ^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Scooldown ^SName^SDisengage ^SShowTimerText^B ^SEnabled^B ^SStates^T ^N1^T ^SAlpha^N0.5 ^t^N2^T ^SAlpha^N1 ^t^N3^T ^t^N4^T ^t^t^t^N4^T ^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Scooldown ^SName^SBinding~`Shot ^SShowTimerText^B ^SEnabled^B ^SStates^T ^N1^T ^SAlpha^N0.5 ^t^N2^T ^SAlpha^N1 ^t^N3^T ^t^N4^T ^t^t^t^t^SLayoutDirection^N5 ^SName^SAbilities~`off~`CD ^t^N85403^S~`~| ^Sgroup^N2 ^^

comments.body:
Some spells report having charges, despite only having one charge. This is up to the whims of whatever game designer at Blizzard last modified the spell in the game's data. TellMeWhen respects what the Blizzard API provides it, even if that API is sometimes wrong.

 

You can just remove the [Stacks...] part from the text displays on the icon to get rid of it.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
